title: Adobe CJM ExperienceEvent - Delivery-Feedback Details
description: Provide details for the Delivery feedback for a single message in the MessageExecution.

xdm:feedbackStatus.title: Feedback Status
xdm:feedbackStatus.description: Provide status of a delivery attempt.

meta:enum.exclude: Messageprofile is filtered out for sending the message
meta:enum.sent: Messages such as Email, SMS, Push that have been dispatched to a person's account, address, or device.
meta:enum.bounce: Message failed to deliver, and no longer will be retried.
meta:enum.delay: message failed to deliver, but will be retry after next schedule time.

xdm:excludeCode.title: Exclude Code
xdm:excludeCode.description: Provide top level exclusion reason, like typology rule, mandatory parameter missing.

xdm:excludeSubCode.title: Exclude SubCode
xdm:excludeSubCode.description: provide exclusion subcode, like exact typology rule-id.

xdm:failureReason.title: Failure Reason
xdm:failureReason.description: Failure reason for a failed delivery attempt.

xdm:failureCode.title: Failure Code
xdm:failureCode.description: Failure code for a failed delivery attempt.

xdm:failureType.title: Failure Type
xdm:failureType.description: Classifies whether it is a soft bounce or hard bounce.

meta:enum.soft: The reason for failed delivery is temprorary.
meta:enum.hard: The reason for failed delivery is permanent.

xdm:retryCount.title: Retry Count
xdm:retryCount.description: Number of failed attempts before the current event. The retryCount starts with '0', for message which is sent in first attempt will have 'retryCount' as 0.
